# Slurm examplejobs

## simple job

    #!/bin/bash -l
    #SBATCH -J MyTestJob
    #SBATCH -N 1
    #SBATCH -p defq
    
    echo "== Starting run at $(date)"
    echo "== Job ID: ${SLURM_JOBID}"
    echo "== Node list: ${SLURM_NODELIST}"
    echo "== Submit dir. : ${SLURM_SUBMIT_DIR}"
    echo "== Scratch dir. : ${TMPDIR}"
    
    cd $TMPDIR
    # Your more useful application can be started below!
    hostname
